title: Embroidery Sample, late 18th–early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread, metal wire, sequins, glass, paper
Technique: embroidered on a compound foundation; in paper envelope
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Floral design embroidered with multicolored silk and chenille thread, metallic thread and wire, sequins and glass on a deep purple ground with vertical stripes.
